attributes.action: The Government to substantially reduce or temporarily suspend all Fuel Duty.
attributes.additional_details: Given the additional Revenue which the Exchequer is receiving in VAT on the higher current Fuel Costs there should be some room for reducing Duty to ease the financial pressures on the average family.
attributes.background: Lowering/Suspending Fuel Duty will have a knock-on Deflationary effect on many other everyday costs including food prices, travel and other essentials which are all components of the Cost of Living Crisis for the average family.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for very similar actions:

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Halve fuel duty and remove VAT on fuel prices: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618421
